message: I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $11000. Can you consider $9500? I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I understand you're still hesitant, but I really think you'll love the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about $10500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $9800? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. How about $10200?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $9500? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.

I understand you're really interested in the product, but I've already made a significant concession. I'm willing to make one more offer, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking of $10000, and that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll love the product.
